abstract: Mark Binelli article describes how landmark lawsuit filed against Bureau of Prisons regarding conditions at United States Penitentiary Administrative Maximum Facility in Florence, Colo, revealed that prison was making its inmates go insane; notes that suit has also brought to fore the way use of solitary confinement in American prisons is exacerbating or creating prisoners' mental disorders.
lead_paragraph: For years, conditions inside the United States’ only federal supermax facility were largely a mystery. But a landmark lawsuit is finally revealing the harsh world within.

headline.print_headline: ‘This Place Is Not Designed for Humanity’
